StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Cave dweller
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: While the others were out hunting and foraging, [PAWN_nameDef] would stay at home to cook and take care of the young and sick.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Digger
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] tribe carved their home deep into the side of a mountain. [PAWN_nameDef] feels most at home picking through rock and shoring up cave walls.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Gatherer
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a master gatherer. [PAWN_pronoun] can find food in the most barren of places using [PAWN_possessive] deep knowledge of plants, roots, and berries.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Apprentice healer
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: After [PAWN_possessive] tribe's elder healer was killed in a raid, [PAWN_nameDef] took on the role. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days scrounging up herbs and mineral compounds from the nearby area to use in surprisingly effective remedies.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Loner
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] never much liked the tribal council or the yearly festivals. [PAWN_pronoun] prefers the open plain and the lonely whistle of wind through the rocks. [PAWN_pronoun] visits [PAWN_possessive] tribe from time to time, but for the most part [PAWN_pronoun] takes care of [PAWN_objective]self using [PAWN_possessive] own survival skills.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Muffalo shaman
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Because of [PAWN_possessive] quiet wisdom and great strength, [PAWN_nameDef] became the spiritual leader for a nomadic tribe that followed the herds of roaming muffalo.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Scout
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Since [PAWN_possessive] tribe has made contact with local outlanders, [PAWN_nameDef] has contracted [PAWN_possessive] services out as a guide to the local area. Frequent contact with ancient relics has made [PAWN_objective] fairly comfortable with the old technology.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Weaver
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an expert at working muffalo wool, plant fibres and natural dyes into beautiful clothing for [PAWN_possessive] kin. [PAWN_possessive] beautiful handicrafts were traded frequently between local tribes.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Caravan leader
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the leader of a tribal trade caravan. Due to [PAWN_possessive] nomadic lifestyle, [PAWN_pronoun] hunted and bartered for [PAWN_possessive] food.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Caravan member
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a member of a nomadic tribal trade caravan. [PAWN_pronoun] was often tasked with caring for the pack animals. Because [PAWN_pronoun] was able to barter or hunt for all of [PAWN_possessive] food, [PAWN_pronoun] never had to worry about growing or gathering food.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Carver
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an expert at carving wood, stone, and bone into beautiful tools and art objects for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_possessive] beautiful handicrafts were traded frequently between local tribes.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Tribal drummer
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a drummer for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] performed songs for ceremonies and festivals.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Tribal elder
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Because of [PAWN_possessive] wisdom and knowledge, [PAWN_nameDef] has become a highly respected Elder in his tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] is looked to for their counsel and guidance by both young and old.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Muffalo herder
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] tended the tribe's muffalo herds, keeping them safe from predators and treating the sick. It was quiet work, but [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed being away from people.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Hunter
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a skilled hunter. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to track and trap the most elusive of animals. [PAWN_possessive] vast knowledge and skill kept [PAWN_possessive] tribe from starving during many cold winters.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Tribal dancer
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a dancer for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] performed for ceremonies and festivals.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Longhouse builder
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was renowned for his skill in building sturdy longhouses and roomy lodges for his tribe.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Tribal captive
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was taken captive by an enemy tribe during a raid. [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to do hard manual labour. Over time [PAWN_possessive] new tribe became like family and [PAWN_pronoun] was adopted as one of their own.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Fire tender
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Tasked with keeping the home fires burning while the others were out hunting and gathering, [PAWN_nameDef] also cooked and cared for the young and sick.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Tribal chief
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a respected Chief in [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] is a brave and strong leader.
